logger.doc:name: Start Log
logger.message: transactionID: #[vars.transactionId], correlationId: #[vars.correlationId], message: "Started update covid case flow", payload: #[payload]

ee:variables.ee:set-variable: %dw 2.0 output application/java --- if (!isEmpty(attributes.queryParams.state)) "select count(*) as count, case_type, state from cvd_case_master where upper(state) = '" ++ upper(attributes.queryParams.state) ++ "' group by case_type, state" else "select count(*) as count, case_type, state from cvd_case_master group by case_type, state"

logger.doc:name: End Log
logger.message: transactionID: #[vars.transactionId], correlationId: #[vars.correlationId], message: "Completed update covid case flow", payload: #[payload]
